website_summaries.verdict: With over 1,000 positive reviews on Amazon, this is a highly popular tactical vest, for good reason.
pros: 1-size fits most design because of girth and length adjustability
4 total magazine pouches that are universally sized
Back loop for additional carrying options
Made with durable, breathable mesh ventilation
External map or document zippered pouch
cons: Some customers commented that the zippers broke too easily on this vest

customer_reviews.title: Well built and fits big and tall!
customer_reviews.text: Well built and very adjustable. I’m 6’2” and 275 and it fits well. I normally wear 2xl or 2xlt. I also bought a left handed drop leg holster to go with it. Took about 10-15 min. of getting all the Velcro and snaps located to fit....but fits nice when done. Has an abundance of magazine pouches and provisions for a bladder or other equipment. Left front has a Velcro “field” that comes with a handgun holster attached. Since I’m a south paw, I removed the holster and added the drop one.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Owen

customer_reviews.title: One size fits almost no-one.
customer_reviews.text: Never trust any ad with zero sizing information. I have a 44 chest and a 40-42 across the belly. Size 38-40 pants. Certainly not svelt but makes it hard to shop when advertisers cannot be bothered with actual fit range. This does not come close to fitting me shirtless let alone with layers as might be needed. The velcro on the holster is cheap and there are no additional loop supports for retention. I would not trust this rig to hold my handgun walking around my house let alone in CQB. Can't give it a real review though because the POS doesn't fit. Had the advertiser POSTED the actual size ranges I might have saved $60.
customer_reviews.author: Not Available

customer_reviews.title: Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: I know y'all feel like cowboys with your new tactical vest, but let me share you with my experience. Fully loaded vest for fitting and adjustment. First time I pull up the zipper, it breaks. I spend 20 minutes trying to draw down the zipper so I can get out of the darn thing. It's not functioning either, is completely stuck. So for the next 20 minutes, I have to fight to get out of the thing like Houdini. Zipper is a critical component, it failed, and it's cheap. BTW, the velcro noise will give you away every time. I know it's inexpensive, the photos are cool, but think twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Product but Zipper Pull broke first time on
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 3 stars because of the zipper pull breaking. Otherwise it would be a 5 star. I like the vest but the zipper pull broke first time I used the zipper. The zipper stuck when all the way up and when I was trying to get it to unzip it the zipper tab/pull broke. For some reason it seem stuck with the zipper all the way up. Setting up it up to fit your size is a bit time consuming but it does fit once adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robert Benson

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked it and tried it on. Took it off to start the adjustment process. The third time I pulled the zipper up, the zipper pull fell apart - into three pieces. I'm returning it, and I'l try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: CiceroTheLatest

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value! Will buy another for my son.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I hoped... but I want counting on much. Though, it's UTG, so they've usually got some decent gear. I was pleasantly surprised. This thing is built to last. It's got a pretty wide range of fit, for different builds. I was able to get it cinched in, at 5'10" 170... I could put on 40 pounds, and it could probably adjust. My only complaint, is it's LOUD. Especially all the velcro and especially where I'm parking my 45 pistol. It's not going anywhere. It's industrial grade velcro. It's just noisy, when it's a huge patch.
customer_reviews.author: GibsonMarshall

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, and not as described in questions and description
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the vest arrived broken. Metal parts of the zipper were busted and looks like it wasn't made very well. It certainly didn't happen in shipping as shipping damage. Second, pouch locations/holster placement are not adjustable as described in comments, questions, and implied descriptions. Nothing is MOLLE mounted on this vest. you can not change the holster side or move pouches. They are sewn in place in fixed location. After these two issues I didn't investigate sizing or anything else in detail, I repackaged it and started my return for a full refund. Sending it back tomorrow morning in "as recieved" which means useless broken condition. *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Candy Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great for shooting sports
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift so my review is based on what the recipient told said: the straps are really heavy duty and velcro, zipper and button snaps all work very well. Has lots of room and six adjustable straps to make the vest snug. At 6 ft tall and 225 lbs, vest fits well and all the pockets/pouches are extremely useful and in the right places! Duty belt is great! And the back of the vest has loops to attach extra equipment. From my perspective, I see that the material is breathable, it has big pockets on the inside (like a jean jacket) and the right shoulder has extra padding for the butt of your rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Chryssy67

customer_reviews.title: I have one of these UTG vests that I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these UTG vests that I have been wearing for years whenever I go shooting or hunting and it has held up famously. I got this one for my son-in-law for Christmas and he loves it too! It will fit almost anybody and you can use the magazine pockets for hunting gear and 8 ounce drink bottles or cans. The mag pockets hold knives and flashlights, the big pocket under the shot shell strip will hold a spare glasses case. Or you can have your semiauto pistol and 5 magazines on this puppy and four magazines for your AR. Or, you can skip the pistol and put six AR mags on it. It is very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Don Webster

customer_reviews.title: Overall, quality seems good.
customer_reviews.text: I like this item. Just think it would be better to have a small molle section somewhere on the front. All molle is on back and inaccessible without taking off vest. I knew this was the case when I purchased and I do like the product. Would just like to see a version with SOME, molle on front. I have an ALL molle vest, and something in between would be a nice option.
customer_reviews.author: Waterdog

customer_reviews.title: I am 6'3, 300lbs and it fits extremely loose until adjusted to disired length
customer_reviews.text: First of all, for all you big people, I am 6'3 300lbs, this vest fully unlatched fits me extremely loose!!! Almost to the point where it will fall right off if i am upside down! So big people dont hesitate!!!!! It will fit!!!. Now this vest is properly made, does not feel cheap at all!! Worth every pennie!! I bought it for airsof and it fits 6 m4 mags without issue! The belt when extended all the way is massive!!! So take my word it will fit!!! Best product i ever bought!! My 1911 mags fit with alot of extra room for dpouble stacks. Overall best purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Esau Monterroza

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of adjust-ability, fits me perfect. I'm 5'8" & 190 lbs. Has good storage capacity. After I made adjustments for fit and added my loaded magazines for the AR and my full size 9mm NATO spec pistol with 3 17 round magazines, multi tool, etc., I thought man this thing is heavy, but once I had it on and cinched down it felt really good, and not nearly as heavy with all the weight up against the body. Really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: First impressions after my first trip to the range with this......The vest is very sturdy, well put together, and after the normal adjustments fits very well. The only complaint I have (and it doesn't take away any stars) is that the vest has some rough edges, that can rub you the wrong way if you are just wearing a tee shirt. Overall great deal for the price. If anything changes after a few more range trips, I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Earle Carlton II

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: Bought this is November, zipper broke I am unable to keep the zipper attached As the plastic piece that hold it in is what broke and can no longer zipper it up Tried contacting seller several times with no response
customer_reviews.author: joseph marinaccio

customer_reviews.title: Very very good
customer_reviews.text: Weight is good. Lots of pocket space. Velcro is strong but I'm gonna sew the sidearm holster into it. Fits a glock 19 or similar size facsimiles and straps in safe. Somewhat adjustable. I'm 5'9" 140lbs and at the tightest it gets, its still wobbly unless I wear a thick sweater. I'd say this is for people with medium to med/large builds. Clips and hooks are plastic but held my body weight when hung from it for a few seconds. Back pack fit comfortably over the back of it. Scarf/facemask doesnt get in the way. Very solid item and I'm glad to have it
customer_reviews.author: Jared Soderberg

customer_reviews.title: Not a paintball setup ( TiPX )
customer_reviews.text: Not viable for paintball or TIPX pistol. I had an old worn vest I hoped to use the tank holder and Velcro pod holders on the back of this vest, but this vest uses a hook and loop and has no Velcro which seems to be the standard with Paintball gear. TiPX is to bulky for pistol holster.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Zipper
customer_reviews.text: While I genuinely like everything about the vest our of the package, the second time I zipped it up, the plastic zipper broke. It is my hope that the seller will see this post and either refund or replace the vest. I will update once i know what the outcome is.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Vest - Zipper broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it and tried it on an zipped it up the zipper broke! I had to use pliers to extricate myself from this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is really a pretty nice vest for the price. Very adjustable, nice belt, good mag capacity, good opportunity to add flexible armor. The only problem I have is the zipper pull was broken upon arrival and fell out of the bag, This is a very cheap piece of pot metal and will not hold up. I held off on the review until I had time to make sure I could make my own. Overall, I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Fit super well, super cool
customer_reviews.text: I'm a really skinny guy so the fact that this thing is able to adjust to just about anyone's size is pretty cool. That was my biggest concern was not being able to fit in it proper. I'm 6-1 and I only weigh about 140 lb. That being said my dad who's like 6-4 and 240 lb could also wear this thing. Lot of different attachments and things that you can do with this super cool for not bad of a price.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Inner map pockets are useful. Roomy enough for a vest beneath while staying ...
customer_reviews.text: Size was just as expected. Fits very well. Plenty of pocket space for everything from magazines to GPS to camera gear to 2-way radios, or all at the same time. Shoulder bolster for rifle use takes a bit of getting used to but works very well. The velcro attachments hold very well and the holster is sized well enough to fit my service pistol without trouble. Inner map pockets are useful. Roomy enough for a vest beneath while staying comfortable and secure. Belt is very adjustable, though takes some time to get just right.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father to ensure he'd have a way to better protect my mother in case of emergency. The holster fit his Springfield XD .45 perfectly with no adjustment, and the pouches fit his Galil magazines just fine. For what it is, it's one hell of a product. What you get: A well-made vest that can easily hold a full-size duty pistol, accessories, and magazines for any 5.56 rifle. It gives you mobility and versatility. What you do not get: body armor or a plate carrier. Those cost a LOT more money. Bottom line: UTG makes some great soft goods, and their rail hardware is good, as well. They're definitely a company you can trust.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Can hold tons of rifle mags
customer_reviews.text: Great vest for the $, this is not a vest to hold plates but could go over a sweatshirt and still be comfortable. What the picture doesn’t show or tell well is that you can remove the gun holster area for magazine holder options which this holds (6) of my AR-15 mags on the vest. Overall for $30 great deal.
customer_reviews.author: xQUIKx

customer_reviews.title: Does What i Need
customer_reviews.text: i was very happy with this purchase and was able to get the fit i wanted quickly. option to move things a around and allow me to carry all i need as needed without any issues. still to new to give more than 4 stars for durability
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is worthless
customer_reviews.text: Just got this vest and the pull on the zipper crumbled the second I touched it then when I zipped it up it would not unzip. I fought with it for an hour before I was finally able to unzip it. For the record I am a reasonably intelligent person who knows how to use a zipper.... I guess you get what you pay for as this was only 50 something $$ but sure wished the zipper worked since I waited weeks to get this and if I send it back I would expect at least another month before I received a replacement. Rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: No one

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was very poor quality a few buttons fell off as soon as I opened the container.
customer_reviews.author: ChiefTain

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just finished arranging all the pouches and the weight distribution on the belt. I only wish it included a detachable back pouch. I need a medium sized Pouch connected to the back with the ability to carry about 15-20L by volume and that it can detach and attach to the back. I also like that there are so many adjustable variations to this. I'm glad I found this for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and has a lot of options for your needs. It fits better if you wear if over something like a thick hoodie or a fatuge jacket. I am 5'5" tho so I am on the small side. It seemed very well stitched and all the buckles, clasps and buttons are strong. Plenty of mole attachments on the back to add a IFAK or other packs.
customer_reviews.author: Nolypoly

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to receive this vest. Upon arrival excitement gone away. Broken buckles ripped Velcro and thread seams coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Unless you are about 6’4” or taller don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are about 6’4” or taller don’t waste your time, otherwise it is actually a pretty nice setup! FYI, I’m 6’ and couldn’t adjust it for a comfortable fit. If they would change the design of the shoulder straps (perhaps splitting them and using Velcro so they would overlap) I would purchase it in a heartbeat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott P

customer_reviews.title: Not just for tactical.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a hike on the Appalachian trail and not tactical use, but I don’t see them as a separate idea. This allowed me to not only carry emergency gear but to do so in a highly organized manner. The vest is a great weight as expected, sturdy zipper and fully adjustable side straps. I have not put it into test yet, however I have already prepped it for the hike. This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: darkangel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vest
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this vest for myself and one of the black ones for my wife. Over all seems well worth the money. The vest is well constructed. Mag pouches fit shorter or extended mags. The pistol holster nicely fits my Beretta px4 storm as well as my hk vp9. Would need leg holster if you have something like a 1911. Doesn't work well with that pistol. You can remove pistol holster and replace it with optional mag pouches if you want which do come with the vest. Size is one size fits all.. it is very adjustable. It adjusted to my size and my wife's size easily. I think it's a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Save time and money shopping around!
customer_reviews.text: UTG Products held up to their name. I am 6' 3" at 258 lbs and this vest fits me perfectly. Bought it for a part of my Bug Out Gear. Vest is fully adjustable in the girth, and the duty belt is a good quality and durable belt. May want to get a set of belt keepers if you plan on using it for any type of Law Enforcement work. But if you want a great carrier for mags and other MOLLE items then this worth the money. (Compared to Blackhawk, Galls, and other law enforcement gear companies ) Can't wait to break this in at the range and get a few Molle packs to put on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda stone

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome quality!! Knowing is half the battle.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I wanted and I did a lot of comparisons before I pulled the trigger on buying this one. Easy to adjust so it will fit over my ballistic vest. Great stitching and strong mesh so far. Not yet battle tested, let's pray it never sees action. Knowing what I know I would buy another in a heartbeat, & knowing is half the battle.
customer_reviews.author: I Am On Fire

customer_reviews.title: Based on quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product, especially considering the good price. Personally I didn't like the design. It's not modular and it's a little heavy (expected for the quality). I'm not going to use it and found one better for my personal taste. Still 5 stars, since it's just a personal taste thing for me. I have mine to my wife and she is small. It fits her and she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Riedl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Just barely fits me. I am 6'4", 280#. I had to let it all out. Just wish it had shoulder adjustment to let it drop down some. Otherwise it fits good.
customer_reviews.author: flstiver@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most versatile piece of equipment I have. It came with an extra double mag pouch with velcro backing. Heavy duty. Each rifle pouch holds two 30 round 5.56 mags. I'm using both Magpul type and metal ones. Each pistol pouch holds two 9mm single stack mags. I'm the left side mag pouch for my BAOFENG Radio. I love the versatility. Love the belt pockets, perfect for a small flashlight and my multi-tool. The back has plenty of MOLLE loops for other gear or hydration system. The weight is distributed evenly. Doesn't feel like anything when I'm wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: David Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely impressed with the quality of this item. Be aware that this is a heavy material and it has some weight all by itself. The options for accessories, such as magazines, are impressive. The vest is easily adjustable. I am 6’ 1”, 255 pounds, and it fit almost perfectly out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jim Bordwine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fat tacticool guys!
customer_reviews.text: Great vest for the money. It’s well made and has all the right pockets. I’m also a big fat guy and the adjustable size it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: At The Price Range...
customer_reviews.text: Of "this" I personally do not see how it can be beat!!! It seems to be very durable, I'm 6' 1" and it fits fine and pockets/compartments for all of my immediate needs, IMHO. *Note* I'm not law enforcement or anything of that sort, just former military but, again, I'm very satisfied. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Bumpy

customer_reviews.title: The smell is not so bad now but it won't last
customer_reviews.text: It's not real fabric. It's a plastic coated type material. The smell is not so bad now but it won't last. It has plenty of adjustments and I managed to make it fit. It might be ok for play but if you're serious about it you're going to end up paying a lot more for a good vest. I'm going to go with the Condor. It's a basic vest and you have to build all the rest with Molle. It'll cost a lot more but it's the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Barna

customer_reviews.title: Fully adjustable, stout, carries weight efficiently, all around good buy
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck right here. Non plate carrier but the versatility of this thing is amazing. Does have inside map pockets and reguardless what some might say the shotshell holder DOES hold 12 gauge, their just really tough to put in (i think their made for 20ga but i made 12ga work) each mag pouch holds 2 30rnd m4/ar mags, even holds a 40 rounder. Pistol mag puches work good. No complaints here. The versatility on this Thing is just amazing. You won't be unsatisfied thats for sure
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: ... was fast took about a week I am really happy with this product It is made well i believe ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast took about a week I am really happy with this product It is made well i believe it is tough For actual duty vest it hold 8 AR 15 mags with the Cross draw holter or 12 mags with Cross draw off there are only 2 down sides that i see one is the Velcro to keep Pockets closed is a little loud i would prefer snap buttons but the Velcro dose hold really well and tight the other is if you are carrying a AR 15 or other rifle It hits the Cross draw holter depending on how you hold it this vest has a place for water blater it breaths good and looks really good
customer_reviews.author: sr

customer_reviews.title: A few very cheap parts
customer_reviews.text: Belt loops are sewn off center and main zipper crumbled like dryed clay on first zip and got stuck at top. Have to return now and hope a replacement gets here fast enough
customer_reviews.author: Jargas

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: We wear these vests when bow hunting and hiking...have to be prepared for grizzly bears or other emergencies where we live.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: not recommended for hunters
customer_reviews.text: It is too heavy (3 lb and 11 oz) with empty pockets.not recommended for hunters.I have 148 lb and it is too big even if adjusted to the minimum. Also when you open the pockets is make lot of noise ( strong velcroaft).
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This vest is much heavier duty and better made than the other (black) ones I purchased previously. The material is solid. The velcro holds the cross draw holster solid when the to strap is tightened. Mag pouches hold 2 30 round mags each. I didn't use the additional velcro-on mag pouches, but they should work fine in place of pistol holster. I would not use them on the belt as the velcro would interfer with comfortable and efficient use. Fully loaded, my vest weights around 40 lbs. and distributes the weight very comfortably. Best vest for the money I have found (out of 4 purchased)
customer_reviews.author: Couple

customer_reviews.title: Nice tactical vest
customer_reviews.text: I spent 26 years in the Marine Corps and I'm replacing my issued tactical vest with this one. My military vest doesn't have the shooting pad on the shoulder which I wanted for my tactical shotgun . It also has everything I need in a SHTF ammo vest for my AR15 and my side arm. The Shotgun shell loops are a little tight for 12 gage shells but after putting some in it I soon realized that tight is good. Keeps the shells in place. The side arm mag pouches are very nice with the exception of the pouch on the holster itself which is very tight for a 40 caliber mag. Overall a great buy for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Its the best one ive had yet
customer_reviews.text: Its a great vest but... 1 im a pretty slim guy and this barely fits me but not as tight as i would want it, 2 the zippers nice but first time i used it the zipper handle it broke because its to thin of metal, 3 the tube for keeping the gun in place is completely useless to me and i would actually argue it gets in the way. But it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: logan king

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent vest!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vest for actual live-fire shooting/training. (I dont play airsoft or paintball) the vest however seems very well made. it arrived just as pictured, and functions as it should. I did not receive a nasty smelling vest some people claim to receive, although it is made in china. Everything is double-stitched. Holds all of my 30rnd magazines, pistol mags, tourniquet, etc. The belt is pretty heavy duty and supports my drop-leg pistol holster well. Overall, for the price point... you cant go wrong here. I ordered Army Digital, and it looks great. Recommended for people who want a good tac vest without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Estes

customer_reviews.title: great vest
customer_reviews.text: As others have said it is heavier than I expected. Still when compared to other higher priced vests, it appears this one will hold up well. The holster is firmly attached which was one of my concerns. Time will tell how long the velcro holds up. Will not be using the magazine pouches on the belt and they remove easily. All in all very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting and although the pattern isn't what many like, I have enjoyed the vest so far. Heavy when fully loaded so make sure you can handle carrying lots of gear without wearing out fast. Next one will be in black. The removable holster has been great because when it is too hot to use the vest, I detach the holster and move on. Extra magazine pouch replaces holster and is good for target shoots at the range.
customer_reviews.author: harper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend getting this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for hunting and got a sling that attached to it to hold a ar15
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Tacti-cool in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well at 6'2" 225 lbs. Quality is great, no complaints. Prior law enforcement experience.
customer_reviews.author: WAYNETTE HOLLIS

customer_reviews.title: Can adjust size for a big man.
customer_reviews.text: The first vest that seems to fit me properly. It has what I want ( need ) for what I will carry. I am 6'1" 255 lbs and I am comfortable with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Randall S.

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat that!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this product. You can carry a (whole) lot of equipment comfortably and easily accessable. The belt is detachable and can be worn seperately. Super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Holster way to big for even a full size 1911
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits but is bulky and stiff
customer_reviews.text: So...this was nice and fit well...then I started the load out :( 270 rounds (9 magazines) of 7.62x39 90 rounds of 9mm Sig P226 (crossdraw holster) FN-5(b) radio First Aid MOLLE pack Hydration Bladder OMG...try moving around with that on....I'm only 5'6"....you move very stiffly with this set up on. And...that's with out body armor on under it... Still I liked it very much...just wish someone had a better / lighter / more flexible set up... Jay
customer_reviews.author: Jay RaxterTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable with a great look
customer_reviews.text: Comfort and ease of use with plenty of adjustment for future items to add on to vest
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality vest! This thing has pockets and compartments for anything you would want to carry. The only downside is that it is quite heavy and using a pistol in this vest is a little awkward for its placement, as the heaviness of the pistol pulls the vest weirdly. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, would have paid $100 for this.
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. The four mag pouches can hold two P-mags each. The handgun holster is removable, it's affixed to Velcro, so you could easily attach something else on that portion of the vest. The mag pouches are sewn on however, three in the front and one just behind your left arm on the back. Also has an attachment for a harness on the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!! It's a must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The vest is made VERY well. The stitching is very strong! Everything about this vest is great!!!! I'm a big Man, 6'1" and 320lb. I have a tall torso so the vest comes right below chest. The shoulder strap do not adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Made well.
customer_reviews.text: It does what I bought it for, it’s put together very well with the exception of the zipper pull. The zipper itself is very well made, and the pull is something I can upgrade easily myself so I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roberts

customer_reviews.title: vest is made of strong material and feels
customer_reviews.text: delivery was slow but understandable these days. havent had a chance to use it yet. so far it looks and feels solid with strong material. cant wait to load it up and give it a test at the range.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: I use this vest while shooting and love the holster on the chest. It fits my glock 17, or my Beretta 92FS flawlessly. It also holds my Glock and Beretta magazines. The only gripe I had about this vest was one of stitches had a piece of fabric folded over in a strange way and made me question how it'd hold up in the long run. I contacted Amazon and they solved the problem though.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Cashman

customer_reviews.title: Nice tac vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is almost as sturdy as my US army load bearing vest. The modular design is nice (you can remove the shotgun shell holder, the belt mag pouches, and the pistol holster). Pros: Fits well once adjusted. Provides decent support with the belt. Pistol holster angle/location is nice. Belt is removable if you need it for something else or if you have a different load bearing belt you want to use. Cons: I do not like the "sniper shoulder" as they call it. It would be nice if there was a carabineer location on the shoulder for my AR. Vest can be a little loud until it is broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Hellofapurchase
customer_reviews.text: This vest is bad a$$, I had no idea what I really purchased, but I took it out of the package it was well worth the money. It has high quality Velcro and the stitching seems to be well done. I'm 6'5" 280lbs and this vest adjusted perfectly. With all the available pockets and not to mention two front inside zipper pockets as well as a large full back pocket, I would buy another one. I'm not using it for field work by any means but it looks and feels as if it would stand up to the task...
customer_reviews.author: Mad_metal

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: All in all very useful and user friendly. The only issue I have is not being able to adjust the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, Even for Me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big guy by any means and this fits perfectly! I'm 5'4, 130 lbs and this is perfect! The holster is great and adjustable. I've carried my Glock 22 with extra clips, a good number of Ar15 mags, ear plugs and so on. Awesome construction! This is a great vest and very tactical. I removed the belt as it was simply too think for my needs. I do use the belt by itself when I don't need the vest. Perfect! If anyone wants some pics I will be happy to post them. This is a great product with many purposes. Awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: LSMNC

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was sceptical, but this thing is not bad at all! The fit is decent right out of the box, short or fat guys will probably have to make some adjustments though. There's plenty of pouches for rifle and pistol mags, the included holster is ok, not great but not terrible. Overall, you won't be disappointed unless you are used to top tier equipment costing many times the price of this rig.
customer_reviews.author: C P

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boys kid because she wanted to play with guns too. She didn't complain about it, so I guess it's nice. Not something I would ever wear on duty but it would be nice like for airsoft play or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: NC Combat Medic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice expecially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice expecially for the price. All mag pouches fit well. Pistol mag pouches it my double stack 45 mags. Tight but thats good. Easy to stuff 2 ar mags into each pouch. Large pistols might be a tad large for the included holster but that doesnt take away from the fact they do fit and it secure. Rifle pad is a nice touch. Over all it seems great
customer_reviews.author: remy

customer_reviews.title: Fit and feels sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this for range days at a private range I attended and it fits great. I’m a 52” chest at 6’1” and fits me great. Holds everything sturdy and secure even when running fully loaded with mags and full size m&p. Great purchase regardless of the price. I have already recommended to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Okimb

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well thought out.
customer_reviews.text: Numerous pockets for rifle and pistol mags. Attached holster holds small and large automatics. Plenty of strap length for larger bodies.
customer_reviews.author: Neverhome

customer_reviews.title: Newbie
customer_reviews.text: Like the holster, still new have not I got the hang of it yet. But for the price so far I'm happy with it though I don't know what higher in brands would be like
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest
customer_reviews.text: Was able to carry 3 30 Rd 9mm clips in each large pouch and took off gun holster and added other holster. The other small pouches I have single 9mm magazine's. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ghstrngr

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I anticipated. I didn't expect this vest to be as sturdy as it is, but it definitely seems as though it's built to last. I inspected it closely when I removed it from the packaging and all of the stitching is solid. The pouches are perfect for storing lots of gear. It can easily stow 4 AR15 magazines, 6 pistol magazines, as well as a full sized semi automatic handgun...with room to spare! Fully adjustable and has metal rings on the shoulders for attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just came in the mail and looks awesome!!! Great adjustablity with the size. Im a medium build and i adjusted it to fit me perfectly. but disadvantage is it wont go any smaller, so if your a small person it might not fit, at least not snug like it would be for a slightly larger person. Overall This vest is awesome, so many pockets and straps for anything you could ever want or need. Feels soft yet very sturdy when you have it on. Great material, not some crappy off brand build. Haven't tested it out for real, but im sure it will take the test/beating. we will see. recommend for anyone who wants a good quality vest.
customer_reviews.author: LostboyzKING

customer_reviews.title: Great for SHTF day.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed. It'll last for decades. It comes with an extra mag pouch to replace the pistol holster if you don't want to use it, which i thought was great. It's a bit stiff, obviously it will break in over time. I have two. One for the truck, one for the house. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: The vest works well for me being 6' 4" and ...
customer_reviews.text: The vest works well for me being 6' 4" and 290lbs. I allows me to place my .45 Colt Commander into the holster and to manage several clips for both my .45 and AR-15, also the added function of adding shotgun shells which is very helpful if you carry all three weapons platforms. Not sure about the cell phone holder though, with todays cell phones might be to big. Otherwise the vest is solid. I wish it was Level III or even Level II protective.
customer_reviews.author: John the Voice

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Amazing gear!
customer_reviews.text: Unreal vest as far as storage, use and customizing the fit just for me. It's exactly what you expect when ordered. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: It Fits!
customer_reviews.text: The key here is that the vest fit. I am a large man, 6"4", 250lbs and was worried about the fit. Not a problem with this vest! With the adjustable buckles I have it form fitted to me and have plenty of room to grow! :-) Generous assortment of mag pouches and storage, I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: MisterHunter

customer_reviews.title: Well made !
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with how well this is made. It is fully adjustable to fit just about anyone. Plenty of room for your gear.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this vest.
customer_reviews.text: I realy have had pretty good luck with UTG prouducts. I am very happy with this purchase. I would deffinitly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again - just a couple of points!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty product! Some advise...do away with those useless things on the belt. I have no idea what to put in them. Make the shotgun shell carrier holes a little bigger! You can get 12 ga in them but it took a while. The only downer is when fully loaded the weight is all on the front which pulls the vest down. Doing away with those questionable "pockets" on the belt could free some cost to provide something to keep the vest from slipping forward!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: A lot better than I thought it would be, given the price. I can't think of how they could make it any better.
customer_reviews.author: NWJ

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: Its every bit as useful and durable as vest that cost 3x as much. Save your money for your ammo and buy this vest.
customer_reviews.author: R.Rettinger

customer_reviews.title: UTG Tactical Vest-Army Digital
customer_reviews.text: The vest is well designed, well built and very sturdy. Magazine pouches easily hold two 30 round magazines for my M4 and my 9mm Glock fits very nicely and securely in the pistol holster. When I ordered the vest I was concerned that it might not adjust enough to be comfortable, I have a large frame, but I was pleased to find that it adjusted easily and perfectly and is extremely comfortable. Matter of fact there's still plenty of adjustment left to compensate for wearing it over heavy winter clothing if need be. I am very satisfied with the vest, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is Great. It has everything I need. The holster is not the best fit, but I am using this for ammo. I added 2 Dump bags on the belt which pushes the weight to the limit. I have found that if you are not looking to pull your mags out of the pouches quickly, then you can stuff 2 metal AR15 30rnd mag in each pouch. The Poly mags are very tight. The fit was perfect, I am 5"11" and 210lbs. A 3lt camel pack fit nice. Also you will not be able to wear a ballistic vest under it [unless your small]. For the price you can't find a better vest.
customer_reviews.author: Jim From Jax

customer_reviews.title: Made adjustments and fits great.
customer_reviews.text: This writer is into cosplay big time and I'm always looking for something that is original. Creating military zombie garb that is believable. Stuck gold with this Tactical vest. Well constructed with quality stitching. I'm a big dude, 6'3"/250#. Made adjustments and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Zhar Tah-Jot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tactical vest! Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is absolutely in love with this vest! It exceeded his expectations by far. Can store up to 10 AR mags, 7 standard pistol clips and a ton of extra internal and external pockets. The material is super high quality and even with over 15 lbs of gear on it, it distrbutes the weight perfectly! We will be buying several more for family members. Great buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah grizzel

customer_reviews.title: Great layout - with molle loops
customer_reviews.text: Not THIS is definitely the one to get - Got 3 different ones from Amazon but this one has it all. Hubby is a big guy (6 ft & 225 lbs) and this one is more than big enough. Great layout - with molle loops, movable pouches, etc Worth EVERY cent!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Moran

customer_reviews.title: but with a few adjustments the vest fits me rather pretty well. I like that it has all kinds ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny frame, but with a few adjustments the vest fits me rather pretty well. I like that it has all kinds of pockets all over the place for anything you can put in it. The rifle mag pouches are somewhat small for the bulky polymer AK mags though, but if you use anything else they should fit o.k. The pistol pouch has a velcro backing that attaches to the left side of the vest, but can be quickly swapped with another pouch (included). Overall it is a great little vest for your hard-earned money. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the carry and any operations
customer_reviews.text: Rugged and light weight. I have it loaded to the hilt.. xtra mags too. Great addition for the range or in case of emergency. Looks cool too !!
customer_reviews.author: F. H. GROSSMAN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a bit to review is product. It works amazing. My buddies laughed and asked me if i was a SWAT guy now. Tell you what, i have had a great time with it. I laugh at them now. They have to go back and forth to reload and all i have to do is pull out another mag, or another gun. Has a built in shoulder pad for righties, which helps out a lot. Was going to order a Condor belt, but it comes with one. Cant say enough about how cool this is. Even in the hottest part of summer it breathes really well.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality
customer_reviews.text: surprising quality. I am 6'3" 245 lbs and the vest adjusts fine for me. Cross draw did require some adjustment but fits my Glock 21 fine as do the mag holders. I am very pleased with the purchase and will probably purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: My review 6/10
customer_reviews.text: Idk why I bought it but it's cool and it fits good . Can't figure out how the belt goes though
customer_reviews.author: joseph davis

customer_reviews.title: Decent fit and quality but a bit heavy and bulky ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent fit and quality but a bit heavy and bulky. You cant really wear this with anything over it to try and conceal it because everything sticks out so much. The holster will fit a Glock 19 w/ Streamlight TLR-4 Tac Light with Laser, Black
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Thiss product is awesome. There are tons of pockets and it's very ...
customer_reviews.text: Thiss product is awesome. There are tons of pockets and it's very adjustable. I actually have 3 of them. It has pockets for AR-15 type clips and clips for pistols like Springfield Armory and Glock. Also has pockets on the belt for storing things like utility knives flashlights and also has stretch Loops that whole shotgun shells. Love this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Crites

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vest
customer_reviews.text: Loaded this baby up with tons of gear and mags it's awesome i will order more for my family
customer_reviews.author: Susan
